description: Detects modification of an existing service on a compromised host in order to execute an arbitrary payload when the service is started or killed as a method of persistence.
name: Modification Of Existing Services For Persistence
query: ((process.command_line:*sc\ * AND process.command_line:*config\ * AND process.command_line:*binpath\=*) OR (process.command_line:*sc\ * AND process.command_line:*failure* AND process.command_line:*command\=*) OR (process.command_line:*reg\ * AND process.command_line:*add\ * AND process.command_line:*FailureCommand* AND process.command_line:(*.sh* OR *.exe* OR *.dll* OR *.bin$* OR *.bat* OR *.cmd* OR *.js* OR *.msh$* OR *.reg$* OR *.scr* OR *.ps* OR *.vb* OR *.jar* OR *.pl*)) OR (process.command_line:*reg\ * AND process.command_line:*add\ * AND process.command_line:*ImagePath* AND process.command_line:(*.sh* OR *.exe* OR *.dll* OR *.bin$* OR *.bat* OR *.cmd* OR *.js* OR *.msh$* OR *.reg$* OR *.scr* OR *.ps* OR *.vb* OR *.jar* OR *.pl*)))
author: Sreeman
